summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of AI girlfriend webapp. All core features tested successfully including user authentication, character selection, AI chat with Gemini 3 Flash, voice generation with OpenAI TTS, and image generation with Gemini Nano Banana. Electric Candy design theme implemented perfectly.
passed_tests: User signup flow with email, username, password
User login flow with email and password
Character selection page displays all 5 AI girlfriends (Luna, Aria, Sakura, Nova, Emma)
Character card navigation to chat page
Chat page loads with character info and empty chat state
Send text messages to AI girlfriend (Gemini 3 Flash integration working)
AI responses displayed in chat bubbles with glassmorphism design
Voice generation button available on AI messages (OpenAI TTS integration)
Image generation button available (Gemini Nano Banana integration)
Landing page loads with Electric Candy branding and neon design
Navigation between pages (landing, auth, characters, chat)
Responsive design with neon glow effects and animations
Backend APIs: 8/8 endpoints passing (100% success rate)
All AI integrations working: Chat, Voice, Image generation
